member.summary: A placeholder to use as model when content is invalid for current barcode format.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BarcodeLabel class.

member.summary: Gets or sets the text or numeric code that should be represented as barcode symbol.

member.summary: Gets or sets the barcode format.

member.summary: Gets or sets the correction level of QR barcodes.

member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the barcode modules.

member.summary: Gets or sets the background color.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Barcodes.WebForms.BarcodeLabel.Font
member.summary: Gets or sets the label font.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Barcodes.WebForms.BarcodeLabel.AutoSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is automatically resized to display its entire contents.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Barcodes.WebForms.BarcodeLabel.LicenseKey

member.name: P:MindFusion.Barcodes.WebForms.BarcodeLabel.ImageGenLocation
member.summary: URL to the ImageGen.ashx file, used to generate the barcode images. This property is rendered as a SRC attribute for the label's IMG element.
